COMMENT_TX: Debut game for Bryan Anderson
$two different position players pitch in the game for the Cardinals: Felipe Lopez and Joe Mather, who is the first St. Louis position player to register a pitching decision since Jose Oquendo in 1988
$Cardinals pitcher Kyle Lohse put in LF; infielder Felipe Lopez pitching
$Cardinals outfielder Joe Mather pitching
Debut game for Jon Jay
Braves pitcher Jair Jurrjens left the game due to an injured leg
Braves shortstop Yunel Escobar left the game due to an injured side
ej,ecksr801,C,davig901,Called third strike on Stammen Nationals Batting Coach Rick Eckstein ejected by HP umpire Gerry Davis
Debut game for Drew Storen

replay,3,lopef001,SLN,darlg901,STL10,O,N,I,,H $the ball hit by FElipe Lopez barely cleared the wall, hit the back wall and came back on the field; the Angels asked about the ruling of a homer; crew chief Gary Darling briefly watched the replay and upheld the call
$Cardinals pitcher Brad Penny left the game due to a torn lat muscle which he hurt when he hit the grand slam in the previous inning
Cardinals second baseman Felipe Lopez left the game due to an injured hand
Cardinals third baseman David Freese left the game due to an injured ankle
Cardinals center fielder Colby Rasmus left the game due to an injured leg
fan interference

replay,4,pujoa001,SLN,cedeg901,STL10,O,N,I,,H $Mariners LF Milton Bradley leaped at the wall in front of the bullpen gate and briefly had the ball in his glove, preventing a possible homer; the ball bounced back onto the field and was ruled in play; crew chief Gary Cederstrom watched the replay and upheld the call
Mariners third baseman Jose Lopez left the game due to an injured knee
fan interference
$the ball bounced out of RF Randy Winn's glove over the fence

ej,larut101,M,carlm901,Balls and strikes $after the first pitch to Yadier Molina was called a strike, Cardinals Manager Tony La Russa yelled at HP umpire Mark Carlson from the dugout; Carlson told La Russa to knock it off and when the manager continued, Carlson ejected La Russa; La Russa came out and argued for a while with Carlson and crew chief Jeff Kellogg; after the game, DBacks pitcher Dan Haren accused La Russa of doing nothing more than trying to delay the game and put Haren off his rhythm
Debut game for Barry Enright
ej,weekr001,P,hirsj901,Called third strike Brewers second baseman Rickie Weeks ejected by HP umpire John Hirschbeck
Brewers pitcher Yovani Gallardo left the game due to an injured side
Dodgers left fielder Manny Ramirez left the game due to an injured leg
Phillies pitcher Jamie Moyer left the game due to an injured elbow

$Ronny Cedeno's bunt bounced down the first base line; he tried to jump over the ball but it hit the back of his left leg; he was called for interference for running into his own batted ball outside the batter's box
$Neil Walker called for interference for running into his own bunt
Cubs first baseman Derrek Lee left the game due to an injured back
Debut game for Steven Hill
Cubs left fielder Tyler Colvin left the game due to an injured elbow
Cardinals pitcher Chris Carpenter left the game due to an injured leg
Debut game for Daniel Descalso
$Catcher Olivo hit on head and neck by follow through of Pujols, left on cart for hospital, diagnosed as mild concussion.
$after SS Clint Barmes bobbled the grounder, he threw late to 2B; Chris Nelson then overthrew 1B to allow two runners to score
